tool_description: Extracts and cleans text content from HTML elements, removing tags, normalizing whitespace, and filtering unwanted content.

html_elements.description: HTML elements to extract text from

normalize_whitespace.description: Whether to normalize whitespace and line breaks

exclude_patterns.description: Regex patterns to exclude from extracted text

error_messages: Empty input: Provide at least one HTML element to process
Invalid regex pattern: One or more exclude patterns contain invalid regex syntax
Processing error: Failed to extract text from one or more HTML elements
usage: Provide HTML elements to extract clean text content. Configure tag removal, whitespace normalization, and content filtering as needed.

extracted_texts.description: Clean text extracted from each HTML element

total_length.description: Total character count of all extracted text
